## InputManager.log() method

Utility middleware that logs the event type to the console.

Can be used with `use(InputManager.log)` for quick diagnostics.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static log(ev: Event, type?: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

ev


</td><td>

Event


</td><td>

The DOM event being logged.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

type


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional explicit event type; falls back to `ev.type`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

Always false (does not consume the event).
